beginner.description: For those new to DevOps and CI/CD concepts
beginner.approach: Step-by-step guided tutorials with detailed explanations
beginner.focus: Understanding fundamental concepts before tool implementation

intermediate.description: For those with basic DevOps knowledge and some tool experience
intermediate.approach: Hands-on labs with less guidance, focusing on integration
intermediate.focus: Building complete pipelines and understanding tool integration

advanced.description: For experienced practitioners looking to master specific tools or scenarios
advanced.approach: Complex real-world scenarios, optimization, and best practices
advanced.focus: Production-ready implementations, security, scalability, and automation

tutorial.description: Follow structured guides with clear instructions
tutorial.output: Working examples with understanding of each step

project_based.description: Build a complete application with full CI/CD pipeline
project_based.output: End-to-end functional pipeline from code commit to production deployment

challenge.description: Solve specific problems or implement requirements without detailed guidance
challenge.output: Problem-solving skills and independent implementation capability

exploratory.description: Experiment with tools and configurations to understand capabilities
exploratory.output: Deep understanding of tool capabilities and limitations
